item.description:
Hola,

Join us for a Fiesta a la Playa at the Battistoni Beach on Lake Street, Burlington, CT, near Karen's home. Come at 3 p.m. to swim, kayak, canoe, chat, rest, relax, and chat some more. For directions, go to www.googlemaps.com and enter Lake Street, Burlington, CT. There is parking along the street and by the beach. Bring swim suits and towel, your canoe or kayak (we have a few to share) and food for dinner and snacking. Don't forget the beach toys!!Questions? Call me at 860-922-7997 (cell) or 860-673-9678 (home). !Hasta luego!

group.name: The Hartford Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: Fiesta a La Playa
